# ZLX-MCP-Server

```bash
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "wisecon-mcp": {
      "command": "uvx",
      "args": [
         "--from",
         "zlxmcp",
         "zlx-mcp-server"
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

> pandas MCP

```bash
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "wisecon-mcp": {
      "command": "uvx",
      "args": [
         "--from",
         "zlxmcp",
         "zlx-mcp-pandas"
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

> report MCP

```bash
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "wisecon-mcp": {
      "command": "uvx",
      "args": [
         "--from",
         "zlxmcp",
         "zlx-mcp-report"
      ]
    }
  }
}
```
